name: Disconnected (TylerC)
description:
Disconnected, get electricity to flow freely to get to the end of the game. The downloadable version of the game includes additional post process effects and graphics enhancements.

This project was made for the weekly game jam 32 and is a prototype I may explore further if enough feedback is given. I have already gotten some good tips to improve.

UPDATE: Sound has been added to the game along with some additional tweaks suggested to me in the weekly jam discord. I will probably add a more experimental set of second levels soon as well.

UPDATE 2: There is currently a bug in the web build with lighting. I'm building a new version now which will be updated shortly.
